item.description: You are invited to the dance party every Sunday evening at the Elegant Nathaniel Silsbee House Mansion in Salem, Mass. The doors open at 7:30 to 11:30 PM for an evening of dance, adventure, and romance. Possibly meet that special one. A 4,000 square foot hall is available to our group of 300+ dancers and there is plenty of seating. Smart casual attire, dress jeans OK, and the admission is $10. Dancer may bring your favorite Cd's and we will play your favorite tunes for you through out the night. Parking is available in the rear of the building and around the Salem Common areas. Partner and line dance lessons will be offered. Room for many hundreds and bring lots of your friends. Don't miss this night of dance fun and adventure. West and East Coast Swing, Hustle, Country Western, Partner and Line, Salsa, Cha Cha, and a lot more.
item.name: Noth Shore, "Singles Dance Party" Meet Up, Salem, Mass.
